text.text: It is a very cozy hotel. The staff are very polite and helpful. Breakfast is complimentary.  The food is absolutely light and delicious,  they seem to have everything on menu and not once were my sister and me told that something on menu isn't available.  The geyser is always available. The room had a.c as well as safe fans with lights. Clean and quiet rooms made our work week pleasant as well as relaxed.

text.text: Nestled amidst the serene countryside, KOKORO Hotel offers a sublime retreat that seamlessly blends the charm of a farmhouse with the comforts of a luxury hotel. From the moment you arrive, you're enveloped in a sense of tranquility and warmth that sets the tone for a truly rejuvenating stay.The rustic yet elegant ambiance of KOKORO Hotel evokes a feeling of being far removed from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. The lush green surroundings, fragrant gardens, and picturesque views create a peaceful sanctuary that invites guests to unwind and reconnect with nature.

originalText.text: Nestled amidst the serene countryside, KOKORO Hotel offers a sublime retreat that seamlessly blends the charm of a farmhouse with the comforts of a luxury hotel. From the moment you arrive, you're enveloped in a sense of tranquility and warmth that sets the tone for a truly rejuvenating stay.The rustic yet elegant ambiance of KOKORO Hotel evokes a feeling of being far removed from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. The lush green surroundings, fragrant gardens, and picturesque views create a peaceful sanctuary that invites guests to unwind and reconnect with nature.

text.text: I was in Balurghat for work, and I never expected to find such a good hotel in the middle of the city. I am very much impressed by the greenery and the beautiful flower garden here! More importantly, it is inexpensive, and every important office is within walking distance.

originalText.text: I was in Balurghat for work, and I never expected to find such a good hotel in the middle of the city. I am very much impressed by the greenery and the beautiful flower garden here! More importantly, it is inexpensive, and every important office is within walking distance.

text.text: In comparison with any other hotel in Balurghat, I think this hotel has the best location, the best ambiance, and the best services. It caters to the individual needs and requirements of each guest. They provide services designed to meet the needs of all types of guests. As a guest, I enjoyed the hotel's personal touches, such as cooking whatever I wanted. They offered me very home-like meals to me. The rooms were very clean and the beds were very comfortable. It was nice to see decorations in the rooms. KOKORO hotel offered me WiFi, hot water, housekeeping services, and a bicycle for transportation. Located in the city center, the hotel is within walking distance of all educational institutions.

As a guest, I enjoyed the hotel's personal touches, such as cooking whatever I wanted. They offered me very home-like meals to me. The rooms were very clean and the beds were very comfortable. It was nice to see decorations in the rooms. KOKORO hotel offered me WiFi, hot water, housekeeping services, and a bicycle for transportation. Located in the city center, the hotel is within walking distance of all educational institutions.

text.text: Having stayed at Kokoro Farmhouse, I am confident its ambiance will make you happy. The place is amazing.Here you can heal your mind, especially if you work in a private company. There is a large garden at Kokoro farmhouse with tropical plants, exotic birds, a miniature pond and colorful aquarium fish. For me, this garden is the most attractive place. There isn't much to see or do in Balurghat after work. The purpose of my visit to Balurghat is to monitor the office systems. In general, we are done with our work by 6 p.m. I spent my free time in the Garden of Kokoro Farmhouse after work instead of going anywhere else in Balurghat. The caretaker didi was very nice . As often as I wanted, she served me milk tea. Just sitting in the garden and spending time there made me feel so relaxed. There is no alternative accommodation like this in Balurghat. I have visited this place more than 5 times. Staying at Kokoro Farmhouse will heal your mind and soul. I would recommend this hotel to all business travelers in Balurghat.

text.text: Very good hotel. Very beautiful , clean and spacious . you can feel home like environment here . The food quality is very good and very hygienic. Wherever I come to Balurghat  for my job I stay at Kokoro farmhouse. I have not found any other hotel like Kokoro farmhouse in Balurghat . You can close your eyes and stay here . You will love the Kokoro farmhouse, I bet .

text.text:
To get best affordable room in balurghat you should check this lodge once for sure. Owners of the Lodge are very much cooperative and open to help you out. Always take care of the customers need. I hardly have seen such aggressive, free of cost cooperation from a hotel owner. They win the trust of guest by their behaviour.

The reason of not giving full point is, the lodge is bit old. And the culture of keeping bust-bin out of the room, creates a messy look outside at evening and stays whole night.

text.text: I have no experience to stay here, but as I informed by others and knowing it's location personally I , giving you some information . It's location is very very convenient for whom those who come to Balurghat for official visit . Administrative H.Q. , Police H.Q . District court, SDO office, SBI and other Banks and financial office, College , School ,  Museum, Market all are in walking distance . It is located adjacent to Balurghat Police Station. The Railway station is about 2 K.M. from hear.   You can avail good transport facility from this point .

text.text: Location is good but Very bad experience.  We checked in at the hotel and entered the room no. 106, but could not find the room clean. They did not provide us soap shampoo, although they promised.  Their service was too bad, number of staff was very low, no one could be found half of the time.  Even the AC remote, dustbin and towel had to be brought from the reception by self. Even  1 day out of 3 days, they did not clean the room, did not empty the dustbin. The flush of the commode did not work properly, sometimes the water did not come and sometimes it did not stop.  There was no latch on the main door of the room, either it had to be kept open or it had to be locked, lock was also a problem.  If you locked it from inside the room, it would not be open, the key would be stuck.  Even the bell switch to call someone for help from the room was damaged or the line was cut.  The night bulb was also damaged. They did not change it even after telling them.  The bathroom was very small, standing inside was difficult to open the door.  And the worst thing was the bed, even if I sat on the bed for a while, it seemed as if it would break immediately and at the same time there are always ugly and annoying sounds.

originalText.text: Location is good but Very bad experience.  We checked in at the hotel and entered the room no. 106, but could not find the room clean. They did not provide us soap shampoo, although they promised.  Their service was too bad, number of staff was very low, no one could be found half of the time.  Even the AC remote, dustbin and towel had to be brought from the reception by self. Even  1 day out of 3 days, they did not clean the room, did not empty the dustbin. The flush of the commode did not work properly, sometimes the water did not come and sometimes it did not stop.  There was no latch on the main door of the room, either it had to be kept open or it had to be locked, lock was also a problem.  If you locked it from inside the room, it would not be open, the key would be stuck.  Even the bell switch to call someone for help from the room was damaged or the line was cut.  The night bulb was also damaged. They did not change it even after telling them.  The bathroom was very small, standing inside was difficult to open the door.  And the worst thing was the bed, even if I sat on the bed for a while, it seemed as if it would break immediately and at the same time there are always ugly and annoying sounds.

text.text: The name BJP More is a bit misleading. It has no truck with the political party by the same name. At least not any more. It's a non descript place that has a petrol pump, apartments, regular shops, motor garages, and a few schools along the State Highway. Most political parties choose this More (pronounced मोड़ in Hindi. English pronunciation of more is a little awkward though and comes closer to "garh" as in Ramgarh, so "morh" may be a better option for those foreign to Bengali or Hindi pronunciation of Bengali "more") to initiate their processions. This place can be accessed from Hili More as well as Subhas Corner,from North and East respectively.

This place can be accessed from Hili More as well as Subhas Corner,from North and East respectively.
